configurable.runtimetrims.yacl.descripti: Trim colours will cycle giving a wave-like effect. Enable "Override Existing Trims" to allow vanilla and other mods' trims to animate.
Modern renderer will render trim indexes. Generated texture files and palettes will be outputted to ".minecraft/rt-debug/" to view the layered textures and resources that the legacy renderer uses.
Enable this to override the existing texture palettes with generated ones and support trim animating on them.
How should the generated palettes be sorted?
Animation speed, lower is faster. 0 for every frame.
The modern renderer uses a custom shader to render the dynamic trims, which is 9x more performant, however, the old renderer is present for shader compat.
